about_the_game: Pixel Composer Demo gives you full access to Pixel Composer features, without the ability to save/load projects, use export nodes (right-click to save is enabled), or use Steam workshop.
detailed_description: Pixel Composer Demo gives you full access to Pixel Composer features, without the ability to save/load projects, use export nodes (right-click to save is enabled), or use Steam workshop.
name: Pixel Composer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any OpenGL supported GPU/iGPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Demo version of Pixel Composer gives you full access to the full version, without the ability to save/load projects, use export nodes (right-click to save is enabled), or use Steam workshop.
